content: There are pretty good PRs which are inactive. Everyone can find and complete those. But some of them are already completed in other PR. If we put another label for them (for example S-completed-in-other-thread, maybe there is already a label for it) people can find incomplete ones very easier.
I believe the original idea was to have it the other way around that good PRs that are closed due to inactivity have the S-inactive-closed label added.
Such PRs are usually simply left open to my knowledge unless the PR author closes them without adding the label (which I've done one, now that I think about it)
@hkalbasi Do you mean closed PRs that are labeled with inactive-closed? I think we could just remove that label if they were finished in another PR.
hkalbasi has marked this topic as resolved.
